title: ORLANDO SILVA - OLHOS MAGOS

ORLANDO SILVA WAS AN EXCEPTIONAL SINGER.

IN HIS INITIAL CAREER PHASE (1935 TO 1942) HE RECORDED FOR RCA VICTOR AND IN A SECOND PHASE (1942 TO 1949) HE RECORDED FOR ODEON. HE WENT ON SINGING UNTIL HIS DEATH OCURRED IN 1978.

THIS CD CONTAINS RECORDINGS OF THAT SECOND PHASE, WHEN ORLANDO VOICE WAS MARVELOUS AND ATRACTED HIS FANS TO LISTEN TO HIM WHERE HE USED TO SING.

THIS CD IS DEDICATED TO PEOPLE THAT LIKE BEL SINGING AND LIKE BEL VOICE.

All tracks were extracted from original 78 rpm and submitted to a sound treatment through SONICFORGE SOFTWARE.
